title: No Stone Unturned
description: After a reckless year of partying as her pop star alter ego, Queen Bee, Gemma Hunter is looking to make a triumphant return to the music world, starting with a move to a brand new home in Los Angeles. However, since announcing her official relationship with teen heartthrob Tyler Chase, a mysterious photo of a disguise-less Queen Bee has been leaked to the public and Gemma fears for her safety now that she may be identified.And as it turns out - she's right to. Someone is following Queen Bee. Not only that, someone is impersonating her, causing mayhem and distrust among Queen Bee's social circle. Thankfully, Gemma has Tyler to protect her from danger. But as more details of her true identity leak to the public, Gemma realizes that suspicion needs to start with her closest friends.Genre: Young Adult (recommended reading age 16+)
author: India Lee
